CustomField.description: This field is optional. It is manually populated by a user. When the value of the field is set to true, the sharing setting of this Relationship is affected to restrict read/write access. This field is used as an indicator if the relationship is an employee. If selected, the relationship is that of an employee of the financial institution.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This box should be checked if the Relationship is an Employee of your Financial Institution
CustomField.label: Employee Relationship
